articles.description: England host Sri Lanka in the first Test at Old Trafford – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka LIVE: First Test, day one, Old Trafford – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: All the latest football news as the winners of the PFA awards are announced after a ceremony in Manchester on Tuesday, plus transfer updates.
articles.title: Football latest: Reaction to Foden and Cole PFA awards plus transfers latest

articles.description: Atletico Madrid sign England midfielder Conor Gallagher from Chelsea for a fee believed to be in the region of £33m.
articles.title: Conor Gallagher: Atletico Madrid sign midfielder from Chelsea

articles.description: Manchester City are working on a deal to bring Barcelona midfielder Ilkay Gundogan back to the club.
articles.title: Ilkay Gundogan: Manchester City working on deal to sign Barcelona midfielder

articles.description: Saudi Arabian clubs lavished about £700m on bringing the world's biggest stars to their league last summer - so why does the spending appear to have stopped?
articles.title: What has happened to the big spending in the Saudi Pro League?

articles.description: Olympic medal-winning cyclist Matt Richardson could face a two-year ineligibility period under UCI rules after switching nationality to Great Britain, says AusCycling.
articles.title: Matt Richardson: Cyclist could face two-year ineligibility period after GB switch, say AusCycling

articles.description: Raheem Sterling is left out of Chelsea's squad for a second successive match - Thursday's first leg of their Europa Conference League play-off against Servette.
articles.title: Raheem Sterling: Chelsea forward left out of Enzo Maresca's squad for Uefa Conference League tie with Servette

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner is cleared of any wrongdoing after twice testing positive for a banned substance in March.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner cleared of any wrongdoing after twice testing positive for banned substance in March

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Phil Foden wins the PFA men's player of the year award, while Chelsea winger Cole Palmer is named young player of the year.
articles.title: PFA awards: Phil Foden wins men's player of year & Cole Palmer young player of year

articles.description: Britain’s Charley Hull is a rare European hope for this week's AIG Women's Open at St Andrews after a nightmare start at the Olympics cost her a medal chance.
articles.title: Women’s Open: Charley Hull a rare European hope at St Andrews after Olympics frustration
